body:
Hi.

I am running regtest in my computer. I compose a tx with locktime in 2020.

``
You can see in [https://coinb.in/?verify#verify](url) that locktime is 1607073506 which is in 2020.

I am running Bitcoin Core Daemon version v0.17.0.0-ge1ed37edaedc85b8c3468bd9a726046344036243

Why is the tx executed? 
Thanks.
title: Tx accepted & executed even though locktime is well in the future.
